value:
$aUnite Heroes from your army and another's
proxy team to fight through $a0 battles!

Heroes from your army and another's that are from
the same title get HP+10 and Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4.

Because the battle lasted past the
end of the event period, the results
are not counted.
Choose the summoner whose Heroes will fight.

Are you sure you want to surrender?
If so, you will not be able to continue.
Set the team you want to send as a proxy.

・ Team has insufficient number
of Heroes.

・ Must add two or more of
another's Heroes.

・ Duplicate Heroes are not allowed
on the same team.

・ Your team can include only one
ally that can use Sing or Dance.

・ Your team can include only one
ally that can use Savior.
Add up to two of your own Heroes to your team.
Work together to make it through!

United Warfront:
Form a team to battle powerful
foes, selecting Heroes both from
your own army as well as from
another player's.

Choose Whose Team to Utilize:
From the list of three, select a
player whose Heroes you want
as part of your team.

Choose Your Difficulty:
Clearing a higher difficulty level
will earn you the rewards from all
the levels below that level.

Form Your Team:
Select four Heroes to fight as a
team, two or more of which must
be from another player's army.

Edit Your Team:
Your team can only include one
ally that can use Sing or Dance
and one ally with Savior.

Rules:
・ Duplicate Heroes are not
allowed on the same team.
・ Heroes who participate in one
battle cannot participate in later
maps in a set, including duplicate
Heroes.

Bonus Tip:
If your team contains a Hero
from your army and one from the
other player's that are from the
same title, those Heroes will
get a bonus of Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4
and +10 to their maximum HP.

More Information:
Legendary and Mythic Hero
seasonal effects are deactivated.
Neither Duo Skills nor Harmonized
Skills can be used. No EXP or SP
will be awarded, and you cannot
use a Light's Blessing.

First-play rewards are available.
Go to United Warfront?

Forma Restrictions:
- Forma cannot be used as the
source for merges or Inherit Skill,
the source of a Rearmed or
Attuned Hero elite inheritance, or
the source of a Combat Manual.
